family.title: Family
family.noMembersDescription: Add your first family member to start tracking their books!

member.cameraPermission: Please grant camera access to take a photo.

books.addBooksToStart: Add some books to start tracking!

series.title: Series

series.noSeriesDescription: Create a series to track your progress through multi-book adventures!
series.selectMemberToSeeProgress: Select a member to see their progress.

series.selectMemberMessage: Please select a family member first to add series to their library.
series.allBooksInLibrary: All books from this series are already in your library.
series.noBooksInSeries: This series has no books yet. Add books to the series first.
series.failedToAddToLibrary: Failed to add series to library. Please try again.

seriesPicker.noSeriesYet: No series created yet. Create a series from the Series tab first.
